>Construction of pLYC5
acquire oligo olyc4				
acquire oligo olyc1
acquire oligo olyc1r
acquire oligo olyc4r
acquire plasmid pJBAG
acquire plasmid pAC-LYC
PCR olyc4,olyc1r on pAC-LYC	(1200 bp, pcrA1)
PCR olyc1,olyc4r on pJBAG	(1172 bp, pcrB1)
Assemble pcrA1,pcrB1	(Gibson, pLYC1)
Transform pLYC1	(Mach1, Amp)
